comment: The main content area containing Chinese characters, definitions, and annotations in a traditional dictionary or lexicographical format. The text is arranged vertically in columns, typical of classical Chinese texts. It includes large characters (likely radicals or entries), smaller explanatory text, phonetic notations (e.g., '聲尼輒切'), and structural notes ('从止从又入', etc.). There is also a heading on the right side indicating page number or section ('小三百九十四') and possibly a name ('李明').
